short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically scroll to the next Instagram Reel when one ends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome Extension that adds an auto-scroll feature on Instagram Reels so you can watch Reels without the need to touch your mouse.

Whenever an IG Reel ends, the extension will automatically scroll to the next one for you. Great for doing homework and watching Reels simultaneously without the need to switch tabs! 

It has a lot of settings for all kinds of Reels use cases, which include:
- Not scrolling when comments are open
- Auto-scroll Up/Down
- And More!

NOTES:
- For ease, use the shortcut, shift + s (or change to your own), to toggle the auto scroller on and off.
- Refresh any open reels tab before use.
- For problems and/or suggestions, go to: https://github.com/Tyson3101/Auto-Reels-Scroller
- This extension has no relationship or authorization with Instagram.
